name: Management System
description: Developed using Flutter for Android, this comprehensive management system streamlines operations within a marble factory. The app leverages Google Drive as its database, seamlessly integrated with Google Cloud API, ensuring efficient data management and accessibility. Key features include inventory tracking, order management, and real-time data updates, all designed to enhance productivity and decision-making within the factory.

name: Portfolio
description: This portfolio showcases a diverse range of my work and skills, emphasizing proficiency in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Each project reflects my commitment to creating intuitive interfaces and robust solutions, tailored to both web and mobile platforms. Through this portfolio, I aim to demonstrate not only technical proficiency but also a passion for innovation and continuous learning in the field of software development.
